hostname dev4
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 ip address 10.34.0.4 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 ip address 10.45.0.4 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
!
router ospf 300
 router-id 10.99.4.4
 network 10.34.0.0 0.0.0.255 area 0.0.0.0
!
router bgp 300
 bgp router-id 10.99.4.4
 neighbor 10.34.0.3 remote-as 300
 neighbor 10.34.0.3 next-hop-self
 neighbor 10.45.0.5 remote-as 500
!
end
